alert.note: Alert for Pike (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 2:52PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Pike County through 330 PM EDT... At 252 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Zebulon, or near Pikeville, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Meta and Raccoon around 310 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
